name: The Matchmaker
description:
This is my entry for the GMC40JAM.

You are The Matchmaker. Rule the dancefloor and match people who may like each other! But make sure to stay in rythm. 🕺🏻

You will gain life if you move in rythm and if you match couples.

Controls:

Arrows or WASD: move

Space: start or restart the game
